name: Flashlight Mechanic Prototype
description:
This project was created to test out creating a dark game with a flashlight where the enemies react to the light. This is meant to be a short mechanical prototype that I built for fun. I was inspired to create this while playing in the dungeons in tunic.

Here is the first person guy from the unreal starter project with a spotlight and a collision square for interactions with other actors.

 

Here is my AI set up with different AI inheriting from a master class.

Here is an example of the AI that flies up when the collision square hits them.
